## Problem 1

$H_0: \sum_{i=1}^{k} \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (y_{ij}-\bar{\bar{y}})^2 = \sum_{i=1}^{k} \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (y_{ij}-\bar{y_l})^2 + \sum_{i=1}^{k} \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (\bar{y_l}-\bar{\bar{y}})^2$  
$H_a:\sum_{i=1}^{k} \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (y_{ij}-\bar{\bar{y}})^2 \neq \sum_{i=1}^{k} \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (y_{ij}-\bar{y_l})^2 + \sum_{i=1}^{k} \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (\bar{y_l}-\bar{\bar{y}})^2$

```{r}
a = rnorm(10, 3, 2)
b = rnorm(10, 3, 1)
c = rnorm(10, 5, 2)
d = rnorm(10, 4, 3)
e = rnorm(10, 4, 3)

data = c(a, b, c, d, e)

grand_mean = mean(data)



a_mean = mean(a)
b_mean = mean(b)
c_mean = mean(c)
d_mean = mean(d)
e_mean = mean(e)
```
